newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China EB-IHD mulls purchase of assets.
newsitem.headline: China EB-IHD mulls purchase of assets.

text.p: China Everbright-IHD Pacific Ltd said on Tuesday it was considering a number of possible acquisitions, including investments held by its controlling shareholder China Everbright Holdings Co Ltd.
"The directors do not rule out the possible acquisition of equity interest in China Everbright Bank," the company said in a statement.
"However, no negotiation whatsoever has been conducted and no binding agreement has been reached in connection with the acquisition."
The company said "there has been no plan for fund raising by way of any rights issue at this stage".

China Everbright-IHD Pacific said it made the statement in response to a local press report it would buy 20 percent in China Everbright Bank from China Everbright Group Ltd, with the deal funded by a rights issue.
The company's shares were up HK$0.20 to HK$6.20 in mid-morning.
